title: 27. Death by Fire?  Probably Not
description: Fire deaths in the U.S. have fallen 90 percent over the past 100 years, a great and greatly underappreciated gain. How did it happen -- and could we ever get to zero?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
